key_findings: Rolling averages (fp_rolling_3) are the most important feature (44.3%)
Historical performance patterns are highly predictive
Utilization and consistency metrics provide additional signal
Age and matchup factors contribute to predictions
NO data leakage - all features are known before game time
methodology_note: position_rank was removed as it used current-game fantasy points (data leakage). Now using only legitimate pre-game features.
recommendation: Use rolling averages, utilization metrics, and matchup data for predictions
